segments.text: What a funny sight, kids sneaking cookies while mom's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, arm deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in the other handâ€”smart thinking, I guess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, palm up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But whoa, the sink's pouring water like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's foot is in it, but she keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's hilarious how unaware she is of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, might reach the stool soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden's all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene has me smiling at the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the stool does look a bit tippy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the light highlights everything so nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR
